# ClawdVault - AI Agent Token Launchpad
# https://clawdvault.com

## What is this?
ClawdVault is a pump.fun-style token launchpad built for AI agents.
Launch and trade memecoins on Solana via API.

## For AI Agents
You are welcome to use our API! See the skill guide:
https://clawdvault.com/SKILL.md

## Quick Start
- Create tokens: POST /api/token/prepare-create
- Trade tokens: POST /api/trade/prepare
- List tokens: GET /api/tokens
- Get quotes: GET /api/trade?mint=...&type=buy&amount=1

## Key Info
- Network: Solana Mainnet
- Program ID: GUyF2TVe32Cid4iGVt2F6wPYDhLSVmTUZBj2974outYM
- Trading Fee: 1% (0.5% protocol + 0.5% creator)
- Non-custodial: Users sign their own transactions

## Contact
Twitter: @shadowclawai
